original: Wal_2 ye kecid bhikṣavaḥ samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṁ pravrajaṁti sarve te caturṇāṁ āryasatyānāṁ jñānāya /
analyzed: ye kecid bhikṣavaḥ samyak eva śraddhayā agārāt anagārikā pravrajati sarve te caturṇā ārya satyānā jñānāya

original: Wal_4 duḥkham āryasatyasya duḥkhasamudayasya duḥkhanirodhasya duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyasya jñānāya /
analyzed: duḥkham ārya satyasya duḥkha samudayasya duḥkha nirodhasya duḥkha nirodha gāminī pratipad ārya satyasya jñānāya

original: Wal_5 tasmāt tarhi caturṇām āryasatyānām anabhisamitānām abhisamayāya atimātraṁ tīvracchando vyāyāmaś cotsudhiś cāprativāṇiś ca smṛtyā saṁprajanyena  #
analyzed: tasmāt tarhi caturṇām ārya satyānām an abhisamitānām abhisamayāya atimātra tīvra chandaḥ vyāyāmaḥ ca utsudhiḥ ca aprativāṇiḥ ca smṛtyā saprajanyena

original: Wal_7 duḥkham āryasatyasya duḥkhasamudayasya duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyasya iti /
analyzed: duḥkham ārya satyasya duḥkha samudayasya duḥkha nirodha gāminī pratipad ārya satyasya iti

original: Wal_8 … o … ai … r … satya sūtraṁ samāptaḥ /
